Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I had lumpectomy Sept 14 2009 IDC with no node involvement, followed with chemo tac and carbo herceptin for 6 treatments every 3 weeks just finished the herceptin for one year. Also have mild lymphedema in hand and fingers. This past week my fingers feel very weak I am having trouble doing every day things in my affected arm. I have ony appointment on Friday. Has anyone had or have this? Thank You for your input. This board is amazing I love it and pray for all my Pink Sisters Daily.God Bless ALL of US!
Posts.Title: finger weakness has any one have it?

Posts.Content: I am not sure which is better I had muga scans. I was on Herceptin for a year which and affect the heart mine were fine. I am sure yours will be fine too. Cindy
Posts.Title: echo better than muga scan

Posts.Content: Every 3months for me so far finished Chemo in Jan 2010. I just went last week to Onc did blood work. Next time is in Oct.Yea! Still have mamo every 6 months with ultrasound and Mri. I hope soon I will not have to back to the BS so often. Good Luck to all of us. Cindy
